With experience in building smart and innovative digital solutions — from responsive websites to advanced applications and third-party service integrations. about.title: About Me
about.content:
As an experienced web developer with deep expertise in JavaScript (ES6+) and the leading technology stack of React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB (MERN Stack), I specialize in creating smart, responsive, and custom web systems and websites. I combine strong development capabilities with deep understanding of user experience (UX/UI) and search engine optimization (SEO) to deliver comprehensive and leading digital solutions.

Proven Expertise:
• Advanced Full-Stack Development: Building robust architectures and seamless integration between frontend and backend
• React & TypeScript: Creating dynamic and intuitive user interfaces with secure and maintainable code
• Node.js & Express & MongoDB: Developing strong and secure API servers
• WordPress Customization: Developing custom templates and plugins

I am committed to delivering digital solutions that generate real business value, while maintaining technological excellence, efficiency, and reliability.
